news.title: Divorces and separations face delays amid row over legal aid funding
news.summary: People seeking state-funded legal ­assistance in divorce, separation and other family law proceedings face the prospect of waiting longer for help due to a shortfall in funding.

news.title: Dublin Airport’s Marty Whelan advert breached rules with emissions claim
news.summary: DAA breached advertising rules when it ran a radio ad voiced by Marty Whelan talking up its plans to cut greenhouse gas emissions.

news.title: Spending plans to be unveiled as Paschal Donohoe warns Irish economic model under threat
news.summary: The country’s economic model is under threat, ministers will be warned today as the Government plans to signal a shift in budgetary strategy towards more permanent spending on infrastructure and services.

news.title: Minister urges consumer watchdog to probe profits of supermarket chains as grocery prices keep rising
news.summary: The competition watchdog has been urged to investigate how profitable supermarkets are and whether there are barriers stopping new retail chains entering the market.

news.title: Meath to move league games to Croke Park
news.summary: Meath will look to play their 2026 Allianz Division 2 football league games in Croke Park in anticipation of Páirc Tailteann being closed for redevelopment later this year.
